title: The Boardroom Series
description: Meet Shane Evans, a dark-haired beauty. Everyone’s go-to girl. Her life has been all work and no play. Things are about to change. Enter Ryan Jamison, the office crush. He’s charming and sexy, totally disarming. The connection is too hot to touch and impossible to ignore. Working late is about to pay off with a moment of indiscretion, and it all begins in the boardroom… Lock the door and draw the blinds. It's about to get steamy!Enjoy Six Stand-Alone Books; over 1100 pages of erotic exploration, seductive submission, and connections that will keep you cuming back fill this erotic romance boxed set.
author: Annabel Lucas
